Default.edit_text:
gs._xyz = gs._xyz
gs._rotation = gs._rotation
gs._scaling = gs._scaling
gs._opacity = gs._opacity
gs._features_dc = gs._features_dc
gs._features_rest = gs._features_rest

Only SH.edit_text:
gs._features_dc = gs._features_dc * slider.dc_scale
gs._features_rest = gs._features_rest * slider.sh_scale

Filter Opacity.edit_text:
mask = torch.linalg.norm(gs._opacity, dim=-1) < slider.opacity

gs._xyz = gs._xyz[mask]
gs._rotation = gs._rotation[mask]
gs._scaling = gs._scaling[mask]
gs._opacity = gs._opacity[mask]
gs._features_dc = gs._features_dc[mask]
gs._features_rest = gs._features_rest[mask]

Highlight Large gs.edit_text:
mask = torch.linalg.norm(gs._scaling, dim=-1) < slider.scaling

color = [slider.r, slider.g ,slider.b]
gs._features_dc[mask] = gs._features_dc[mask] * 0 + torch.tensor(color, device="cuda")

Random Colors.edit_text:
torch.manual_seed(0)
gs._features_dc = torch.rand_like(gs._features_dc) * slider.intensity - slider.intensity / 2
gs._features_rest = gs._features_rest * 0

Recoloring.edit_text:
selected_color = torch.tensor([slider.r, slider.g, slider.b], device="cuda")

gs._xyz = gs._xyz
gs._rotation = gs._rotation
gs._scaling = gs._scaling
gs._opacity = gs._opacity
gs._features_dc = gs._features_dc + selected_color
gs._features_rest = gs._features_rest

Filter Small gs.edit_text:
mask = torch.linalg.norm(gs._scaling, dim=-1) < slider.scaling

gs._xyz = gs._xyz[mask]
gs._rotation = gs._rotation[mask]
gs._scaling = gs._scaling[mask]
gs._opacity = gs._opacity[mask]
gs._features_dc = gs._features_dc[mask]
gs._features_rest = gs._features_rest[mask]

Wobbel.edit_text:
gs._xyz[:,2] = torch.sin(gs._xyz[:,2]+slider.x)/5 + gs._xyz[:,2]
gs._xyz[:,0] = torch.sin(gs._xyz[:,0]+slider.x)/5 + gs._xyz[:,0]

Slice Scene.edit_text:
mask_x = gs._xyz[:, 0] < slider.x
mask_y =gs._xyz[:, 1] < slider.y
mask_z =gs._xyz[:, 2] < slider.z

mask = mask_x & mask_y & mask_z

gs._xyz = gs._xyz[mask]
gs._rotation = gs._rotation[mask]
gs._scaling = gs._scaling[mask]
gs._opacity = gs._opacity[mask]
gs._features_dc = gs._features_dc[mask]
gs._features_rest = gs._features_rest[mask]

1 inspect a single gaussian.edit_text:
index = int(slider.x)

gs._xyz = gs._xyz[index:index+1, ...] * 0
gs._rotation = gs._rotation[index:index+1, ...]
gs._scaling = gs._scaling[index:index+1, ...]+4
gs._opacity = gs._opacity[index:index+1, ...]
gs._features_dc = gs._features_dc[index:index+1, ...]+2
gs._features_rest = gs._features_rest[index:index+1, ...]

select by color.edit_text:
compare = torch.tensor([slider.r, slider.g, slider.b]).to("cuda")
mask = torch.linalg.norm(gs._features_dc[:, 0, :] - compare[None, :], dim=1) < slider.threshold
mask = mask.to("cuda")

gs._xyz = gs._xyz[mask]
gs._rotation = gs._rotation[mask]
gs._scaling = gs._scaling[mask]
gs._opacity = gs._opacity[mask]
gs._features_dc = gs._features_dc[mask]

gs.features_rest = gs._features_rest[mask] if len(gs._features_rest) > 0 else gs._features_rest

luma_ai.edit_text:
mask = torch.linalg.norm(gs._xyz - torch.tensor([0,0,0])[None, :].to("cuda"), dim=1) > slider.x

gs._scaling[mask] = gs._scaling[mask] - 10
gs._opacity[mask] = gs._opacity[mask] - 2

2d grid.edit_text:
num_gaussians = gs._xyz.shape[0]
grid_sidelen = int(np.sqrt(num_gaussians))
grid_ids = torch.arange(num_gaussians, device=gs._xyz.device)

grid_us = (grid_ids % grid_sidelen) / grid_sidelen - 0.5
grid_vs = grid_ids // grid_sidelen / grid_sidelen - 0.5

grid_xyz = torch.zeros((num_gaussians, 3), device=gs._xyz.device)

grid_xyz[:, 0] = grid_us
grid_xyz[:, 1] = grid_vs.flip(dims=(0,))
grid_xyz[:, 2] = 0


gs._xyz = grid_xyz
gs._scaling = gs._scaling * 0 - 5
gs._features_dc = grid_xyz[:, None, :]*5
gs._opacity = gs._opacity+10

2dgrid_fix.edit_text:
num_gaussians = gs._xyz.shape[0]
grid_sidelen = int(np.sqrt(num_gaussians))
grid_ids = torch.arange(num_gaussians, device=gs._xyz.device)

grid_us = ((grid_ids % grid_sidelen) / grid_sidelen - 0.5) * 2
grid_vs = (grid_ids // grid_sidelen / grid_sidelen - 0.5) * 2

grid_xyz = torch.zeros((num_gaussians, 3), device=gs._xyz.device)

grid_xyz[:, 0] = grid_us * slider.k
grid_xyz[:, 1] = grid_vs.flip(dims=(0,)) * slider.l
grid_xyz[:, 2] = 0

xyzh = torch.ones([grid_xyz.shape[0], 4], device="cuda")
xyzh[:, :3] = grid_xyz
xyzh = (cam_params @ xyzh.T).T
xyzh = xyzh / xyzh[:, 3:4]
grid_xyz = xyzh[:, :3]

gs._xyz = -grid_xyz
gs._scaling = gs._scaling * 0 - 5
gs._features_dc = grid_xyz[:, None, :]*5
gs._opacity = gs._opacity+10

2dgrid_rand.edit_text:
num_gaussians = gs._xyz.shape[0]
grid_sidelen = int(np.sqrt(num_gaussians))
grid_ids = torch.arange(num_gaussians, device=gs._xyz.device)


grid_xyz = torch.zeros((num_gaussians, 3), device=gs._xyz.device)
grid_xyz[:, 0] = gs._xyz[:, 0] * slider.l
grid_xyz[:, 1] = gs._xyz[:, 1] * slider.l
grid_xyz[:, 2] = -0

xyzh = torch.ones([grid_xyz.shape[0], 4], device="cuda")
xyzh[:, :3] = grid_xyz
xyzh = (cam_params @ xyzh.T).T
xyzh = xyzh / xyzh[:, 3:4]
grid_xyz = xyzh[:, :3]

gs._xyz = -grid_xyz
gs._scaling = gs._scaling * 0 - 6
gs._features_dc = grid_xyz[:, None, :]
gs._opacity = gs._opacity+10

rotation_mask.edit_text:
rotation_yaw = torch.eye(n=4, device="cuda")
rotation_yaw[0, 0] = np.cos(slider.alpha)
rotation_yaw[0, 1] = -np.sin(slider.alpha)
rotation_yaw[1, 0] = np.sin(slider.alpha)
rotation_yaw[1, 1] = np.cos(slider.alpha)

rotation_pitch = torch.eye(n=4, device="cuda")
rotation_pitch[0, 0] = np.cos(slider.beta)
rotation_pitch[0, 2] = np.sin(slider.beta)
rotation_pitch[2, 0] = -np.sin(slider.beta)
rotation_pitch[2, 2] = np.cos(slider.beta)

rotation_roll = torch.eye(n=4, device="cuda")
rotation_roll[1, 1] = np.cos(slider.gamma)
rotation_roll[1, 2] = -np.sin(slider.gamma)
rotation_roll[2, 1] = np.sin(slider.gamma)
rotation_roll[2, 2] = np.cos(slider.gamma)


rotation = rotation_yaw @ rotation_pitch @ rotation_roll

points_h = torch.ones([gs._xyz.shape[0], 4], device="cuda")
points_h[:, :3] = torch.clone(gs._xyz)
points_h = (rotation @ points_h.T).T
points_h = points_h / points_h[:, 3:4]
rotated_points = points_h[:, :3]

mask_x = rotated_points[:, 0] < slider.x
mask_y =rotated_points[:, 1] < slider.y
mask_z =rotated_points[:, 2] < slider.z

mask = mask_x & mask_y & mask_z

gs._xyz = gs._xyz[mask]
gs._rotation = gs._rotation[mask]
gs._scaling = gs._scaling[mask]
gs._opacity = gs._opacity[mask]
gs._features_dc = gs._features_dc[mask]
gs._features_rest = gs._features_rest[mask]

2d_grid_translate.edit_text:
num_gaussians = gs._xyz.shape[0]
grid_sidelen = int(np.sqrt(num_gaussians))
grid_ids = torch.arange(num_gaussians, device=gs._xyz.device)


grid_xyz = torch.zeros((num_gaussians, 3), device=gs._xyz.device)
grid_xyz[:, 0] = gs._xyz[:, 0] + slider.l
grid_xyz[:, 1] = gs._xyz[:, 1] + slider.k
grid_xyz[:, 2] = -2

xyzh = torch.ones([grid_xyz.shape[0], 4], device="cuda")
xyzh[:, :3] = grid_xyz
xyzh = (cam_params @ xyzh.T).T
xyzh = xyzh / xyzh[:, 3:4]
grid_xyz = xyzh[:, :3]

gs._xyz = -grid_xyz
gs._scaling = gs._scaling * 0 - 6
gs._features_dc = grid_xyz[:, None, :]
gs._opacity = gs._opacity+10

recolor.edit_text:
torch.manual_seed(0)
gs._features_dc = torch.rand_like(gs._features_dc) *torch.rand_like(gs._features_dc)*torch.rand_like(gs._features_dc)* torch.tensor([slider.x, slider.y, slider.z], device="cuda") /slider.i
gs._features_rest = gs._features_rest * 0

show layers.edit_text:
start=512+ 512*4+ 4*4*512+ 4*4*4*512*2
end=  512+ 512*4+ 4*4*512+ 4*4*4*512*2 + 4*4*4*512*2*2

gs._xyz = gs._xyz[start:end]
gs._rotation = gs._rotation[start:end]
gs._scaling = gs._scaling[start:end]
gs._opacity = gs._opacity[start:end]
gs._features_dc = gs._features_dc[start:end]
gs._features_rest = gs._features_rest[start:end]
